mapper.sql: SRC_ID, SRC_FLAG, GEN_DT, MER_NO, MER_NAME, FMRCH_NO, FMRCH_NAME, TRAN_DATE, SCENE, CRDPRODUCT, CARD_TYPE_NAME, TRAN_NUM, round(TRAN_AMT,2) as TRAN_AMT, REF_NUM,round(REF_AMT,2) as REF_AMT,round(FEE,2) as FEE , FEE_TYPE, round(NET_AMT,2) as NET_AMT, STL_FLAG, STL_BOOK_ID,round(STL_AMT,2) as STL_AMT, STL_DATE, FEE_STL_ID, FEE_FLAG, COMMENTS
mapper.select:
select
example.distinct
from VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK
order by ${example.orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK (SRC_ID, SRC_FLAG, GEN_DT, MER_NO, MER_NAME, FMRCH_NO, FMRCH_NAME, TRAN_DATE, SCENE, CRDPRODUCT, CARD_TYPE_NAME, TRAN_NUM, TRAN_AMT, REF_NUM, REF_AMT, FEE, FEE_TYPE, NET_AMT, STL_FLAG, STL_BOOK_ID, STL_AMT, STL_DATE, FEE_STL_ID, FEE_FLAG, COMMENTS) values (#{srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{genDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmrchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmrchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crdproduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tranNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stlBookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stlAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeStlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK
SRC_ID,
SRC_FLAG,
GEN_DT,
MER_NO,
MER_NAME,

FMRCH_NAME,

NET_AMT,
STL_FLAG,
STL_BOOK_ID,
STL_AMT,
STL_DATE,
FEE_STL_ID,
FEE_FLAG,
COMMENTS,

mapper.update:
update VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK
SRC_ID = #{record.srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_FLAG = #{record.srcFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
GEN_DT = #{record.genDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NO = #{record.merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NAME = #{record.merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMRCH_NO = #{record.fmrchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FMRCH_NAME = #{record.fmrchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_DATE = #{record.tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCENE = #{record.scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRDPRODUCT = #{record.crdproduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_TYPE_NAME = #{record.cardTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAN_NUM = #{record.tranNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRAN_AMT = #{record.tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REF_NUM = #{record.refNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REF_AMT = #{record.refAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE_TYPE = #{record.feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NET_AMT = #{record.netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STL_FLAG = #{record.stlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STL_BOOK_ID = #{record.stlBookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STL_AMT = #{record.stlAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STL_DATE = #{record.stlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_STL_ID = #{record.feeStlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEE_FLAG = #{record.feeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENTS = #{record.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK set SRC_ID = #{record.srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_FLAG = #{record.srcFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, GEN_DT = #{record.genDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_NO = #{record.merNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_NAME = #{record.merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMRCH_NO = #{record.fmrchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FMRCH_NAME = #{record.fmrchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_DATE = #{record.tranDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCENE = #{record.scene,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRDPRODUCT = #{record.crdproduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_TYPE_NAME = #{record.cardTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAN_NUM = #{record.tranNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRAN_AMT = #{record.tranAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REF_NUM = #{record.refNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REF_AMT = #{record.refAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE = #{record.fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE_TYPE = #{record.feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NET_AMT = #{record.netAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STL_FLAG = #{record.stlFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STL_BOOK_ID = #{record.stlBookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STL_AMT = #{record.stlAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STL_DATE = #{record.stlDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_STL_ID = #{record.feeStlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_FLAG = #{record.feeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENTS = #{record.comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sum(tran_num) || '#' ||to_char(sum(tran_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' ||sum(ref_num) || '#' || to_char(sum(ref_amt),'fm999999999999990.90') || '#' || to_char(sum(net_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' || to_char(sum(stl_amt),'fm999999999999990.90')|| '#' || to_char(sum(fee),'fm999999999999990.90') as fee from VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK

select mer_no,mer_name,sum(tran_amt + ref_amt+REVOCTION_AMT) as tran_amt from VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK
group by mer_no, mer_name order by tran_amt desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM( select mer_no, mer_name, sum(tran_amt + ref_amt+REVOCTION_AMT) as tran_amt from VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK
group by mer_no, mer_name order by tran_amt desc) a WHERE ROWNUM <= ${endResult} ) WHERE rn > ${startResult}

select count(*) from ( select mer_no, mer_name, sum(tran_amt + ref_amt+REVOCTION_AMT) as tran_amt from VIEW_MERDAILY_BOOK
group by mer_no, mer_name)
